title: Moderate-speed city driving on a clear day, with 13 braking events or strong decelerations.
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a busy city street, following a white car and changing lanes.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 6.8 m/s). There are 13 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
